sentence.Network_en: A juridical precedent is nothing but " authenticated custom ".
sentence.Network_cn: 司法惯例只不过是 “ 权威的惯例 ” 罢了.

sentence.Network_en: In juridical practice , there also exist different opinions and settlement methods.
sentence.Network_cn: 在司法实务中也存在不同的态度、不同的处理方法.

sentence.Network_en: The central focus of my paper lies in the juridical reforms.
sentence.Network_cn: 俄罗斯在司法领域内的改革是本文关注的中心.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin juridicus (from jus, jur- 'law' + dicere 'say') + -al

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the law or jurisprudence;
2. relating to the administration of justice or the function of a judge;
